KEM.F.summary: Kemira Oyj operates as a chemicals company in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Americas, and the Asia Pacific. It operates in two segments, Pulp & Paper and Industry & Water. The Pulp & Paper segment develops and commercializes pulp, paper, and packaging chemicals, as well as a range of products for paper wet-end, including packaging and board, and tissue products. The Industry & Water segment offers coagulants, polyacrylamide polymers, and other water treatment chemicals for raw water, waste water and sludge treatment, and shale and conventional oil recovery applications. Kemira Oyj was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
